infos.value: It is important to go into Quick-Pick Matches with knowledge pertaining to units' elements and compatibility.
Select your best soldiers for this battle and gain the upper hand.

• Quick-Pick Matches •
In Quick-Pick Matches, six units are organized in advance, with three of them being selected for battle after matching.

• Event Durations •
Event durations and battle times can be reviewed.

• Party Formations •
Formations can consist of up to six units. After matching, all units in your formation will be disclosed to your opponent.

• Season Reports •
Results of past Quick-Pick Matches for each season can be reviewed.

• Ranking •
You can confirm your own ranking and the top rankings. Ranking is determined by battle results.

• Rewards •
Rewards can be acquired during the Reward Claim Period. Rewards are determined by the class you are in at the end of the battle period.
Proceed to a tutorial on Dummy?
